about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of car adventures, where you will feel the real adrenaline, getting behind the wheel of powerful cars, improve your driving skills and master the art of drifting.

Discover the world of game currency to buy unique cars and conquer new heights. Collect a collection of luxurious cars, improve them to your style.

Enjoy the freedom and drive at incredible speeds, Each trip promises new impressions and challenges, making your car adventures unforgettable.

The game is in the Developers' Stage, so some features may not be there yet

The game is based on the updated base, there will be 10 updates in total, with each update, new mechanics will be added

And the old ones will be improved
